text_block_list.text: It was two days after the Selection Race.
The meeting with Symboli Rudolf looming tomorrow, I walked about, struggling to find an answer.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Ah! Excuse me, aren't you the trainer who was chatting with Rudolf in the cafeteria the other day?

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Haha! When a renowned horsegirl like Ms. Rudolf is spotted sharing a meal with a trainer right after the Selection Race, it's bound to catch people's attention!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hahah… It seems we've garnered more interest than we anticipated.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: If you don't mind, I do have a favor to ask from a trainer as close to Ms. Rudolf…

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Could you spend the day with her and take photos?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I apologize for springing this on you, Trainer. You see, I've been approached regarding a feature delving into my true self.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: However, in the presence of the media, I tend to assume a particular persona.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I was contemplating my options when you walked by.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: I believe Ms. Rudolf can be more at ease around you, Trainer. Please, I'm counting on you!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Really? You're willing to do it? Well I'll be… You are quite accommodating indeed.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I'll be counting on you today then.
I thus received a camera from the reporter and proceeded to take on the role of photographer…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Now, she said she wanted me to not worry about the camera and carry on with my day as usual.
choice_data_list: What are you planning to do today?
What are your plans for today?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Among the new students, there is one who appears a bit anxious. I intend to execute a plan I've devised to address her concerns.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Shall we go?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah. ……There you are, Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: My, Rudolf! And… hello, Trainer♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Did you come looking for me? What can I do for you?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Yes, I have a request regarding a new student named Grass Wonder.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Grass Wonder! I know her. She's so charming and cute♪ What's going on with her?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I'm not sure if it's because she's still adjusting to the campus and courses, but she seems to be facing some initial difficulties.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: My, is that so? Well, adapting to a big change of surroundings can indeed be quite a challenge……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I can't bear to just let things take a downturn like this. Would you mind offering her a word of advice?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Of course… Why me, though?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Grass Wonder… There's something about her explosive speed that reminds me of your running style.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: That's why I believe you might have something valuable to convey to her.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I see… You're quite observant, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You can leave it to me! Do you know where our little Grass is right now?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Thank you, I appreciate the swift response. Let me lead the way, Maruzensky.
Guided by Symboli Rudolf, we came to where Grass Wonder was…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh… she seems really down. Alright, big sis is here to help～!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Good to hear. I'm counting on you, Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Even if I were to go, I might come across as intimidating. That's not my intention.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Just letting her know that you're watching and concerned would be enough… Hmhmm, you're so awkward sometimes.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well then, I'm off.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I hope this helps lift her spirits, even if only a little.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— Grass Wonder… a returnee from the United States, known for her kind and dependable nature. But she also possesses a strong inner drive and a no-nonsense side.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: She runs as a betweener. An exceedingly promising horsegirl, who uses her innate observational skills to aim for victory with patience and accuracy.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It's not just her. Every horsegirl here possesses tremendous potential, arriving at the campus gates filled with hopes for their future.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I wish… all these students could continue smiling. I can't help but feel that we must create a world where that is possible.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Do you consider it the fanciful dream of a young girl who hasn't yet seen the world? …Indeed, perhaps that is the case.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Of course, the journey to make it a reality is an endless one. However ——

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Ms. Maruzensky. Maybe I was getting a little too impatient…

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, you know, you're a hardworking and diligent girl, that's really admirable!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But sometimes, being too diligent can be overwhelming. How about going for a drive with your big sis once in a while?♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Certainly! Hehe… I'm honored to be invited♪

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— Take a look at her smile.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I wish that it would last forever… What hesitation could I have in doing so?
As Symboli Rudolf expressed these sentiments, her profile exuded serenity, and a contented smile played upon her lips.
—— Suddenly, the camera in my hand caught my eye.
(Click)
I took an incredible photo. At that very moment ——
It felt as if I had found the answer to Symboli Rudolf's assignment.
